channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 4, 09:30 - 12:30 UTC

Oct 26, 00:01 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 04/11/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 04/11/2024 12:30 UTC
Service impact : Some servers will be unavailable for 3 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server
item.description:

Oct 15, 21:29 UTC

Service impact : Management will be temporarily unavailable for 1h30 during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage Cluster6259 incident notification
item.description:
Oct 26, 17:50 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the Availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 26/10/2024 14:15 UTC
Service impact : Cluster6259 is temporarily unavailable.
Root cause Hardware issue
Ongoing actions : A restoration is currently in progress to resolve the issue.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage/Management incident notification
item.description:
Oct 26, 10:38 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and all services are back to normal.

Start Time : 25/10/2024 14:50 UTC
End Time : 26/10/2024 07:30 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to an electrical issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Oct 26, 00:07 UTC
Update - Update : The majority of affected services have been restored. Our teams are still working to restore services to the last affected customers.

Oct 25, 17:47 UTC
Update - Service impact : Some storage Clusters and hosts in LIM1C are temporarily unavailable.

Customers weren't able to access their Veeam backup between 17:18 UTC and 17:28 UTC.
Veeam backup service is now operational.

Our technical teams are currently working on the remaining impacted clusters and hosts.

Oct 25, 17:00 UTC
Identified - Service impact : Multiple Clusters in LIM1C are temporarily unavailable.
Customers aren't able to access Admin VM.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are still working on the issue.

Oct 25, 15:38 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are still working on the incident.

Oct 25, 15:24 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the Availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 25/10/2024 14:50 UTC
Service impact : Multiple Clusters in LIM1C are temporarily unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX2D][VMware Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification - Cluster10072
item.description:
Oct 19, 06:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/10/2024 17:03 UTC
End Time : 19/10/2024 06:18 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2d
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Oct 19, 05:09 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 19, 04:24 UTC
Identified - Service impact : Since 19/10/2024 03:45 UTC, customers aren't able to access the current datastores:
ssd-001351; ssd-001350; ssd-001345.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the issue

Oct 18, 17:22 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Oct 18, 17:08 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our VMware Private Cloud offer.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 18/10/2024 17:03 UTC
Service impact :Customers aren't able to access the current datastores: ssd-003553 - ssd-001348 - ssd-001537 - ssd-001351 - ssd-001350 - ssd-001345
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
